ai-ja386:1.4_0: they’re not filled with a fire.”
ai-ja386:2.2_0: to know the net of a child,
ai-ja386:2.3_0: For one is raised up in a kingdom,
ai-ja386:3.4_0: you will live with a knife.”
ai-ja386:5.2_0: The wife will be right at ease
ai-ja386:6.1_0: “One who is loved by such things,
ai-ja386:6.2_0: (But) after putting aside self, he does not do what is pleasing.
ai-ja386:6.3_0: Oneself is best: what is better (than that)?
ai-ja386:6.4_0: Through gaining that benefit, later one (will have) what is (truly) pleasing.”
ai-ja386:7.1_0: The first section for recitation on child.
